email_subject: Still Getting Involiced for Your Deal #258505
email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 03/26/2001 02:56 PM --------------------------- "Piazza, Perry A [CORP]" <perry.a.piazza@citi.com> on 03/26/2001 02:46:53 PM To: "'john.arnold@enron.com'" <john.arnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: Still Getting Involiced for Your Deal #258505 John - Could you please alert your back office that they are still invoicing us on a Nov-Mar strip that was traded on June 20, 2000 at $4.105. That deal was cancelled per our discussion and rebooked for half the volume in November (I beleive it was November). Your deal number on the rebook is QF9221.1 I beleive. I beleive Dutch Quigley on your end was involved when we originally discussed the deal. Thanks and call if you have any questions. Perry A. Piazza Citibank/Salomon Smith Barney Global Commodities 390 Greenwich Street, 5th Floor New York, NY 10013-2375 Phone: (212) 723-6912 / (212) 723-6979 Fax: (212) 723-8556 E-Mail: perry.a.piazza@ssmb.com
